thread.title: Unified Korean Women’s Ice-Hockey Team Falls to Switzerland at Olympics

author: Eun-Young Jeong
title: Unified Korean Women’s Ice-Hockey Team Falls to Switzerland at Olympics
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—When Jong Su Hyon, the star North Korean player on the joint inter-Korean women’s ice-hockey team, was asked how it felt to play on the Olympic stage in South Korea, her answer was simple:
“It felt like I was back home.”
The unified Korean team, playing before a loud and partisan crowd, was overmatched by their much...
